caption.title: Scatter plots of trends over 1979–2015 from CMIP5 multi-model ensemble members.
caption.p: ( a) March Barents Sea SIE trend versus annual global mean SAT trend ( b) March Barents Sea SIE trend versus trend of annual mean Atlantic heat transport across the BSO (HT BSO). In parentheses (model list) is the number of ensemble members for each model. Solid red circles: CMIP5 multi-model ensemble mean trends. Thick red crosses: spread (±1 s.d.) across multi-model ensemble members. Grey solid circle and thick grey cross in b: adjusted multi-model mean trends and spread (see text). The solid black circle in a denotes the observed trends. The solid black line in b marks the observed March Barents Sea SIE trend. Red dashed lines: least-square linear fits.
